trans-unit.source: Defines methods for reading the parts of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> and also for limited types of writing to the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> 파트를 읽기 위한 메서드 및 제한적인 문서 쓰기 유형을 쓰기 위한 메서드를 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain a reference to an object that implements this interface.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에는이 인터페이스를 구현 하는 개체에 대 한 참조를 가져오는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> to obtain an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> collection in order to access each page in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> 얻으려고는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> 컬렉션의 각 페이지에 액세스 하기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The definition that is added.
Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
Flushes the package <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and also commits an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> to the package.
Gets the zero-based position of the document in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that represents the document location in the sequence.
Gets the <see langword="DocumentStructure" /> part, if one exists, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure" /> that represents the <see langword="DocumentStructure" /> element, if one exists, and its child elements.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="DocumentStructure" /> 요소(있는 경우) 및 하위 요소를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document does not need to have a Document Structure part.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 문서에서 문서 구조 부분이 포함 될 필요가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> readers, one reader for each page in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />의 각 페이지에 하나씩 지정되어 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> 판독기 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection of fixed page readers, one reader for each page in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />의 각 페이지에 하나씩 지정되어 있는 고정 페이지 판독기 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader.FixedPages%2A> property to obtain an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> collection in order to access the individual pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader.FixedPages%2A> 속성을는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader> 컬렉션의 개별 페이지에 액세스 하기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the page.
Gets a reader for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader" /> for the page.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />, if one exists, that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that contains the default printing options for the document; or <see langword="null" /> if no print ticket exists for the document.
trans-unit.target: 문서의 기본 인쇄 옵션이 포함된 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />이거나, 문서에 대해 인쇄 티켓이 없는 경우 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> 의 일부로 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 문서, 2 장 참조는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 사양에서 얻을 수 있는 [XPS: 사양 및 라이선스 다운로드](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The definition that is removed.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
Gets a collection of all the signature definitions that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />와 연결되어 있는 모든 서명 정의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of signature definitions, typically one for every person who signed or will sign the document.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 문서에 서명을 했거나 서명할 모든 사람에게 하나씩 지정되어 있는 서명 정의의 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the thumbnail image, if a thumbnail exists, that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />와 연결되어 있는 축소판 그림 이미지(있는 경우)를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> that represents the image.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document.
The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader.Uri%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentReader.Uri%2A> 속성을 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.
